name: Matt Ox
description: '''Matthew Christopher Grau''' (born December 13, 2004), known professionally as '''Matt Ox''', is an American rapper and singer from Philadelphia. He is best known for his 2017 single "Overwhelming", and for being featured on the 2018 platinum certified track "$$$" on [[XXXTentacion]]'s sophomore album ''[[? (XXXTentacion album)|?]]'' (2018).
